feed.title: App Store Discounts（TW）
feed.subtitle: App Store Discounts - Made with love by appstore-discounts(https://github.com/appstore-discounts/appstore-discounts) feedId:73536236398899200+userId:73658201673997312 feedId:157008546980077568+userId:73658201673997312

entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Calorie Counter PRO MyNetDiary
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • MyNetDiary Premium：$1,000.00 → $270.00 [$270.00 ~ $1,000.00]

全部价格信息

价格：$120.00

App 內購買

  • MyNetDiary Premium：$270.00

应用描述

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAY… The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE • Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. • Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. • Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps. • Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS • Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. • Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. • Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. • Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS • Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week • Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: • Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. • Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. • Customizable dashboard for your goals. • iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. • Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES • Up to 108 nutrients tracked • Plan macros • Full set of charts • Timestamps • Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: • Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. • Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. • Macros planning and cycling. • Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. • Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. • Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. • In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Lifetime license：$2,990.00 → $1,490.00 [$1,490.00 ~ $2,990.00]

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買

  • PRO yearly subscription：$1,190.00
  • Lifetime license：$1,490.00
  • Monthly Subscription：$170.00
  • Yearly Subscription：$650.00

应用描述

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

应用截屏

iPad

entry.title: 百貨公司物語
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

应用描述

打造一個讓人感到無比幸福的超棒百貨公司吧。 可以開設你所喜歡的店鋪！這是一款經營理想百貨公司的遊戲。 不僅能夠招商，還可以自由配置樓梯、電梯、直升機平台等各種設施。遊戲內還附有當人氣超過一定數值後客人就會蜂擁而至的Fever系統哦。 透過投資活動來拓展周邊地區，努力成為一家有著眾多老顧客的人氣百貨公司吧。 你究竟是否能讓它成為一家人氣購物中心呢？ ---- 其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp 還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 南國度假島物語
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$190.00 → $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $190.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$90.00

应用描述

讓擁有豐富大自然的小島進一步發展，目標是成為遊客數量No.1的度假村！ 首先以度假村開幕為目標，建造住宿設施後迎接客人入住。 整頓旅館的周邊環境後，就可以找出深具魅力的旅行方案。盡量增加遊客會喜歡的旅行方案吧！ 只要讓度假村變得更多元，或許就能實現遊客的旅遊目的。 在環繞著海洋的小島，美麗的大海也是觀光景點之一。若能和魚兒們多多交流，就能增添更多美好回憶。 設置海草或岩石提升水質，或是將上鉤的魚兒放流，都能提高魚兒在這裡住下來的機會。 如果度假村變得越來越吸引人，也能和委託者洽談開店和商品開發計畫。 盡量推廣度假村的魅力，抓住委託者的心吧！！ 蓋一間使用新鮮現摘水果的果汁吧，別忘了在旁邊擺上長椅喔。 若小島誕生了著名景點，可能會有更多遊客蜂擁而至！！ 來打造一塊讓遊客們露出燦爛笑容的度假村吧！ 本作還支援觸控捲動及畫面的擴大縮小。 更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。 https://kairopark.jp 這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！ 都是2D點陣圖風格的Kairosoft系列遊戲喔。 請跟隨我們的X(Twitter)，以獲得最新資訊。 https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

价格：$120.00

应用描述

勇者傳說將從你的村莊發跡 從草原到雪國，乃至於魔界！可在各式地圖上享受開發村莊的樂趣。建造旅館或武器店、防具店等設施，前來驅逐怪物的冒險者們就會造訪村莊。 將裝備或道具贈送給冒險者，輔助他們完成任務吧。村外偶爾會出現神秘迷宮，怪物也會隨之出現。打倒大量怪物來賺取金錢與經驗值吧。 另外如果村中設施或食物、自然等要點的魅力提高，就會被視為村莊的特徵並獲得稱號。其中或許會有非常稀有的稱號……？ 隨著設施與稱號增加，村莊的人氣也提高後，可能還會出現希望擁有舒適小屋的冒險者。 本作也會出現許多獨特的怪物！ 其中可能還有怪物願意成為冒險者的可靠夥伴！？ 只要給予點心來提升友好度，就能騎乘怪物戰鬥，戰力也會隨之上升。 招攬各種怪物成為夥伴，挑戰上級任務吧。另外只要解鎖世界地圖並達成條件，就能在新的土地上建立村莊。 移至不同地區，可能就會有新的冒險者造訪村莊，或許還能遇到未知的強大怪物……？ 努力打造出生氣蓬勃的最高級別村莊，讓許多冒險者與夥伴怪物入住吧。 本作也支援觸控捲動、放大及縮小等功能。 可以在「Kairosoft」搜尋看看其他遊戲喔。 https://kairopark.jp 裡頭有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲及買斷制應用程式！ 這是2D點陣圖的Kairosoft遊戲系列作喔。 請跟隨Twitter以得知第一手情報。 https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

  • Pro Access：$2,990.00 → $300.00 [$300.00 ~ $2,990.00]

App 內購買

  • Ultimate Access：$440.00
  • Pro Access：$300.00

  • Abstract Theme 2：$30.00
  • Gradient Rainbow：$30.00
  • Abstract Theme 1：$30.00
  • Gradient Bundle：$60.00
  • Gradient Purple Theme：$30.00

应用描述

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。 添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。 使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！ 超過100種創意字體可供選擇！ 可以翻譯超過59種語言！ 特徵： •具有創意字體的全鍵盤。 •創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。 •在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。 •更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。* •設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。* •將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。 •保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。 •選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。 •更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小 •將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。* •語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。* •使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。 •只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。 •商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！ 還： •在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。 •單擊即可共享您的位置。 •在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。* •從大量字體中選擇。* •自定義字體大小。* •自定義字體顏色。* •使用“安全”類別保護短語。 •使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。 •使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。 •直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。 •直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。 •創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。 •使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。 （*）需要有效的訂閱 記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。 （僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。 短語板高級訂閱信息 加入Phraseboard Premium可以進行3天的免費試用，然後每月收取會員費。 •訂閱會自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉了自動續訂功能。 •將在當前期間結束前的24小時內向帳戶收取續訂費用。 •訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過購買後轉到用戶的“帳戶設置”來關閉自動續訂。 •如果適用，則免費試用期中任何未使用的部分（如果提供）將在用戶購買訂閱時被沒收。 隱私政策：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/untitled-c82w 服務條款：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/terms

entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • 1,200K金幣：$60.00

  • 12個月專業天氣套餐：$150.00
  • 美國AQI (PM2.5)訂閱：$120.00

应用描述

国家天氣Pro（National weather pro) - 即時提供未來15天天氣預報、全球雷達、颱風實時路徑及預報、地震、空氣品質、未來15天（360小時）每小時天氣預報、花粉過敏、釣魚、室外運動、降雨概率、當前即時天氣等功能。無廣告免費天氣App。 ****準確、即時、15日天氣預報**** 即時更新當前天氣。 定位地址精確到街道門牌號，天氣精確到所在位置周邊1.2KM範圍內。 更新地址，即時更新天氣信息。 15日全球天氣預報，出行計劃更保障。 ****15日（360小時）每小時天氣預報**** 未來15日，每個小時的天氣情況 每小時支持天氣、溫度、體感溫度、氣壓、紫外線、露點、能見度、風向、風速、雲層覆蓋率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、釣魚指數、運動指數等等 更細緻準確的出行規劃 ****地震**** 支持近200年，共72萬條地震記錄。並即時更新最新地震信息。 地震可在地圖內展示，提供地震震級、強度、深度，致死率預估、強度圖、影響城市，海嘯、山體滑坡、地震液化等不同等級預警。 地震數據繁雜難懂，我們提供每個指標的通俗化提示。 ****衛星雷達**** 提供颱風等級、運動路徑、影響範圍等在地圖內展示。 支持雷達、雲圖、24小時降雨量、24小時降雪量、雷電、溫度、體感溫度、紫外線、露點、溫度、駕駛難度信息及未來預報，在地圖上展示。 ****Apple Watch**** 支持Apple Watch，以及錶盤複雜功能。 ****支持 Widget**** 支持桌面widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度，未來6小時天氣及未來2天天氣預報 支持鎖屏widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度等。 ****花粉過敏預報**** 為花粉過敏用戶提供未來15天的所在位置的花粉過敏信息 ****生活指數**** 釣魚：支持未來15天每小時釣魚指數 運動：支持未來15天每小時運動指數 是否攜帶雨傘提醒 防曬指數及提醒 穿衣指數及提醒 洗車至少及提醒 顯示當前日期日曆 ****個性、美觀**** 收錄各地美麗風景作為天氣背景圖片，更簡潔美觀 用戶可以自定義壁紙，更有個性，將您喜愛的圖片設置為天氣背景 【訂閱功能說明】 取消方法：請用戶手動在蘋果設備【設定】>>【iTunesStore與App Store】>>選擇【Apple ID】>>點擊即【查看Apple ID】>>在賬戶設置界面點擊【訂閱】>>取消國家天氣的訂閱即可。 【專業天氣套餐自動續訂價格】 購買3個月專業天氣套餐 每3個月將以$0.99美元的價格購買和自動續費 購買6個月專業天氣套餐 每6個月將以$1.99美元的價格購買和自動續費 購買12個月專業天氣套餐 每12個月將以$3.49美元的價格購買和自動續費 自動續費扣款時機：定於其結束前1天自動續費延續。在訂閱結束前1天取消,則訂閱方案會停止。 用戶使用及隱私政策：http://u3dyouxi.com/weather/term.html 自動續訂服務協議：http://u3dyouxi.com/weather/subscribe.html

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Small Pack：$20.00 → $10.00 [$10.00 ~ $30.00]

全部价格信息

价格：$10.00

App 內購買

  • Small Pack：$10.00
  • Big pack：$150.00
  • Medium pack：$90.00

应用描述

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 — World Wetlands Day March 3 — World Wildlife Day March 21 — International Day of Forests March 22 — World Water Day March 23 — World Meteorological Day April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 — Earth Day May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 — World Environment Day June 8 — World Oceans Day June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 — World Animal Day October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 — International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$39.00 → $10.00 [$10.00 ~ $39.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$10.00

App 內購買

  • Small Pack：$20.00
  • Big pack：$150.00
  • Medium pack：$90.00

应用描述

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 — World Wetlands Day March 3 — World Wildlife Day March 21 — International Day of Forests March 22 — World Water Day March 23 — World Meteorological Day April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 — Earth Day May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 — World Environment Day June 8 — World Oceans Day June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 — World Animal Day October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 — International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 短語鍵盤
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Ultimate Access：$4,990.00 → $440.00 [$440.00 ~ $4,990.00]
  • Pro Access：$2,990.00 → $300.00 [$300.00 ~ $2,990.00]

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

App 內購買

  • Font Access：$1,790.00
  • Ultimate Access：$440.00
  • Pro Access：$300.00
  • Phrase sharing：$120.00
  • Gradient Rainbow：$30.00
  • Abstract Theme 1：$30.00
  • Gradient Bundle：$60.00
  • Gradient Purple Theme：$30.00
  • Nature Beach Night Theme：$30.00

应用描述

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。 添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。 使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！ 超過100種創意字體可供選擇！ 可以翻譯超過59種語言！ 特徵： •具有創意字體的全鍵盤。 •創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。 •在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。 •更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。* •設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。* •將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。 •保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。 •選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。 •更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小 •將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。* •語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。* •使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。 •只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。 •商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！ 還： •在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。 •單擊即可共享您的位置。 •在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。* •從大量字體中選擇。* •自定義字體大小。* •自定義字體顏色。* •使用“安全”類別保護短語。 •使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。 •使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。 •直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。 •直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。 •創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。 •使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。 （*）需要有效的訂閱 記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。 （僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。 短語板高級訂閱信息 加入Phraseboard Premium可以進行3天的免費試用，然後每月收取會員費。 •訂閱會自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉了自動續訂功能。 •將在當前期間結束前的24小時內向帳戶收取續訂費用。 •訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過購買後轉到用戶的“帳戶設置”來關閉自動續訂。 •如果適用，則免費試用期中任何未使用的部分（如果提供）將在用戶購買訂閱時被沒收。 隱私政策：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/untitled-c82w 服務條款：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/terms

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad
